    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/reservation/v2

    Facet Receipt_Detail

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/reservation/v2:Receipt_ID
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/reservation/v2:Receipt_Summary
          • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/reservation/v2:Receipt_Detail

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<ReceiptDetail xmlns:fin-0300="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3" xmlns:order-0300="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3" xmlns:ota2-0400="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4" objID="receipt_1" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/reservation/v2">
    <Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</Identifier>
    <ReceiptRef>receipt_1</ReceiptRef>
    <order-0300:PaymentSummary objID="payment_1">
        <order-0300:Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00">guid12345</order-0300:Identifier>
        <order-0300:PaymentRef>payment_1</order-0300:PaymentRef>
        <fin-0300:FormOfPaymentSummary costCenterID="Example String Value" guaranteeID="Example String Value" guaranteeIndicatorInd="true" objID="formOfPayment_1" paymentTransactionTypeCode="charge" remark="Example String Value">
            <fin-0300:Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</fin-0300:Identifier>
            <fin-0300:FormOfPaymentRef>formOfPayment_1</fin-0300:FormOfPaymentRef>
            <fin-0300:Privacy optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
            <fin-0300:GuaranteeTypeCode>Air travel card</fin-0300:GuaranteeTypeCode>
        </fin-0300:FormOfPaymentSummary>
        <order-0300:Amount currencyCode="USD" minorUnit="2">80000</order-0300:Amount>
        <ota2-0400:Person birthDate="2011-01-24" gender="Male" maritalStatus_Enum="Annulled" objID="person_1">
            <ota2-0400:Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00">guid12345</ota2-0400:Identifier>
            <ota2-0400:OtherID organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</ota2-0400:OtherID>
            <ota2-0400:PersonRef>person_1</ota2-0400:PersonRef>
            <ota2-0400:PersonNameDetail defaultInd="true" language="en" type="Alternate">
                <ota2-0400:Prefix>Mr.</ota2-0400:Prefix>
                <ota2-0400:Given>John</ota2-0400:Given>
                <ota2-0400:Middle>Example String Value</ota2-0400:Middle>
                <ota2-0400:Surname>Smith</ota2-0400:Surname>
                <ota2-0400:SurnamePrefix>Example String Value</ota2-0400:SurnamePrefix>
                <ota2-0400:Suffix>Example String Value</ota2-0400:Suffix>
                <ota2-0400:Title>Example String Value</ota2-0400:Title>
                <ota2-0400:PersonDocument>
                    <ota2-0400:DocType>NaturalizationCertificate</ota2-0400:DocType>
                </ota2-0400:PersonDocument>
                <ota2-0400:Privacy optInDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" optInStatus="OptedOut" optOutDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" shareMarketInd="Inherit" shareSyncInd="Yes"/>
            </ota2-0400:PersonNameDetail>
            <ota2-0400:AddressDetail language="en" role="Home" validInd="true">
                <ota2-0400:AddressLine>111 Travers St, Dun Laoghaire Co. Dublin Ireland</ota2-0400:AddressLine>
                <ota2-0400:BldgRoom buldingInd="true">Bldg H</ota2-0400:BldgRoom>
                <ota2-0400:Number pO_Box="98567499" ruralRouteNmbr="88" streetDirection="NNW" streetNmbrSuffix="B">563</ota2-0400:Number>
                <ota2-0400:Street>Travers Street</ota2-0400:Street>
                <ota2-0400:City>Dublin</ota2-0400:City>
                <ota2-0400:County>Fairfax</ota2-0400:County>
                <ota2-0400:StateProv name="Texas">TX</ota2-0400:StateProv>
                <ota2-0400:Country name="Ireland">IR</ota2-0400:Country>
                <ota2-0400:PostalCode>32165-9999</ota2-0400:PostalCode>
                <ota2-0400:Remark>This address should be used for all official correspondences.</ota2-0400:Remark>
                <ota2-0400:Privacy optInDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" optInStatus="Unknown" optOutDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" shareMarketInd="No" shareSyncInd="Inherit"/>
                <ota2-0400:Type>Business</ota2-0400:Type>
                <ota2-0400:Use>Billing</ota2-0400:Use>
            </ota2-0400:AddressDetail>
            <ota2-0400:TelephoneDetail areaCityCode="202" countryAccessCode="01" defaultInd="true" extension="237" id="telephone_1" pIN="1234" phoneNumber="5555555" remark="Don't call after 10:00PM" role="Home">
                <ota2-0400:Privacy optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
                <ota2-0400:PhoneLocationType>Brand reservations office</ota2-0400:PhoneLocationType>
                <ota2-0400:PhoneTechType>Voice</ota2-0400:PhoneTechType>
                <ota2-0400:PhoneUseType>Contact</ota2-0400:PhoneUseType>
            </ota2-0400:TelephoneDetail>
            <ota2-0400:Email defaultInd="true" remark="Example String Value" textFormat="Example String Value" validInd="true">
                <ota2-0400:Address>Example String Value</ota2-0400:Address>
                <ota2-0400:Type>Business</ota2-0400:Type>
                <ota2-0400:Privacy optInDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" optInStatus="OptedOut" optOutDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" shareMarketInd="Inherit" shareSyncInd="Yes"/>
            </ota2-0400:Email>
            <ota2-0400:Privacy optInDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" optInStatus="Unknown" optOutDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" shareMarketInd="No" shareSyncInd="Inherit"/>
            <ota2-0400:Comments language="en">Some fee text.</ota2-0400:Comments>
        </ota2-0400:Person>
        <order-0300:OfferRef>a111 a222 a333</order-0300:OfferRef>
    </order-0300:PaymentSummary>
    <order-0300:OrderIdentifier objID="order_1">
        <order-0300:Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00">guid12345</order-0300:Identifier>
        <order-0300:OrderRef>order_1</order-0300:OrderRef>
    </order-0300:OrderIdentifier>
    <ReservationIdentifier objID="reservation_1">
        <Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</Identifier>
        <ReservationRef>reservation_1</ReservationRef>
    </ReservationIdentifier>
</ReceiptDetail>
